text: (Mu ichindu ya) pa duniya ni ku Akhera. Soni niakum'busya ya ŵawina. Jilani: “Kwajilanyichisya ŵanganyao iŵele yambone, nambo naga n'di m'bwanganyichilene nao (mpaka iŵe yambonepe) ngati achalongo achimijenu, soni Allah akummanyilila nkuwatanganya ni nkwilanya, sano Allah angasache akankandapachisye (malamusi), chisimu Allah ni Jwamachili gakupunda, Jwalunda lwakusokoka.”
